mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvCstPlcHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , HIST_DT , DLV_PLC_NM , BASE_DLV_CST_PLC_YN , RTRVL_DRCT_PSB_YN , DLV_MN_CD , DLV_COM_CD , DLV_PSB_DAY , DLVSP_POST_NO , DLVSP_BASE_ADDR , DLVSP_DETAIL_ADDR , OVSEA_DLV_BOX_PSB_VOL , OVSEA_DLV_BOX_PSB_WT , DLV_CST_LEVY_SECT_CD , OVSEA_DLV_CST_EXM_STDR_AMT , RETRN_MN_CD , RETRN_COM_CD , RETRN_POST_NO , RETRN_BASE_ADDR , RETRN_DETAIL_ADDR , RTGOD_DLIVY_DLV_CST_INCLS_YN , DLV_MTHD_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND HIST_DT = #{histDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
